input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Liking spicy food has a direct effect on relationship status. Appearance has a direct effect on relationship status. For people in a relationship, the correlation between liking spicy food and attractive appearance is -0.03. If we look at people in a relationship, does it mean that liking spicy food does not affect attractive appearance?
